visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a horizontal organization chart. The chart should have a title 'Highcharts Horizontal Org Chart'. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the organizational structure with nodes and links. Custom colors should be applied to different levels of the organization. Additional configurations should include settings for chart margins, background, legend, and exporting options.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a horizontal organization chart. The chart title is set to 'Highcharts Horizontal Org Chart'. The data series is defined as an organization type, with nodes and links representing the hierarchical structure of an organization. Each level of the organization is styled with specific colors and data labels. The chart also includes exporting options to allow HTML in the exported chart and to set the source dimensions for exporting. This configuration effectively visualizes the organizational structure with clear and distinct styling for different levels.
